passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > section:nth-child(1) > section:nth-child(3) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > aside:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > header:nth-child(1) > div > div > h3
